```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

library(WDI)
```


```{r}

WDIsearch("Foreign direct investment")

WDIsearch("OCDE")



FDI <- WDI( indicator = c("IC.BUS.EASE.DFRN.XQ.DB1719","BX.KLT.DINV.CD.WD"  ),start=2016, end= 2019, extra = TRUE)


FDI <- FDI %>% 
  rename(db = IC.BUS.EASE.DFRN.XQ.DB1719, fdi = BX.KLT.DINV.CD.WD)

FDI <-  FDI %>%
  mutate(log_fdi = log(fdi), db = round(db,2)) %>% 
  
  filter(complete.cases(fdi, db)) %>% 
   na.omit()
 
 

  

FDI %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = db , y =log_fdi))+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  geom_point(aes(color = income))


FDI %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = db , y =log_fdi))+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  geom_point(aes(color = region))

  


# https://github.com/vincentarelbundock/WDI
# https://cengel.github.io/gearup2016/worldbank.html

```
